agosthu 31 wanada wanawita siyalu ma widesha hamuda thama ratin iwath kala gathayuthu bawata wana kala wiramaya, kisiseth digu no karana bawa afghanisthanaye balaya athpath karagena sitina thaleyiban sanwidhanaya pawasanawa.eya athi karagath ekangathawan ullanghanaya kirimak lesayi thaleyiban prakashaka suhayil shahin prakasha kale.ewani thaththwayaka di dadi prathiwipakawalata muhuna dimata sidu wanu athayi thaleyiban sanwidhanaya anathuru angawa sitiya.me athara, amarikanu pentaganaya sandahan kale agosthu 31 wanada wanawita afghanisthanayen nikmime salasum methek wenas kara nomathi bawayi.thaleyiban sanwidhanaya ee sambandhayen darana adahasa thaman wataha gena sitina bawa pentaganaye prakashaka jon karbi sandahan kala.kese namuth, dahas sankhyatha afghan siwil wasiyan ratin nikmima sandaha kabul guwan thotupola asala thawaduratath rok wi sitina athara, ee sandaha agosthu 31 kala wiramaya dirgha kirima pilibanda salaka balanna yi ratawal rasak amarikawen illa thibenawa.antharjalaya osse ada pawathwen ji 7 samuluwe di brithanya agamathi boris jonsan , amarikanu janadhipathi jo bayidngen ee pilibanda wimasimak karanu athi.thaleyibanwarun kabul nuwarata athulu wu agosthu 14 wanada sita me dakwa amarikawa wisin pudgalayan 48 dahasak pamana afghanisthanayen iwath karagena athi bawayi dhawala mandiraya prakasha kale.
manda me siyalla siduwanne wiwidha dil matha bawath ee sandaha srujuwama kalamanakaruwan sambandha wana bawatath dan dan kshethraye kathabahak athiwa thibenawa.
